vulnerabilities.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in kaptinlin Striking allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Striking: from n/a through 2.3.4.
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in kaptinlin Striking allows Path Traversal.This issue affects Striking: from n/a through 2.3.4.
